content: less is more simple stitches create a lovely fabric which is ideal to showcase semi-solid tonal or subtly variegated yarns 4 sizes charted and written-out instructions **yarn** barka piktor cinege 100% wool 465 meters 508 yards / 100 g 1 2 2 3 skeins **needles** 3 5 mm us 4 circular needle at least 100 cm 32 inches long 4 5 mm us 7 circular needle at least 100 cm 32 inches long **notions** stitch markers yarn needle blocking pins **sizes** xs 120 cm x 37 cm 47¼ inches x 14½ inches s 144 cm x 46 cm 56¾ inches x 18 inches m 162 cm x 52 cm 63¾ inches x 20½ inches l 186 cm x 61 cm 73¼ inches x 24 inches **gauge** 19 stitches / 40 row = 10 cm 4 inches in pattern chart a using 3 5 mm us 4 needles blocked *note obtaining the gauge given is not crucial for a successful project but will affect the finished size and the yardage needed * 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/agnes-kutas-knitwear-design/topics/2572023
